code: var weekendapi=[{id:1,image:"https://www.plushescapes.com/images/uploads/attachments/56594748173702583209455864742972365008756n.jpg",title:"Mount Abbot ",info:" Picturesque Hamlet",to:'/abbotmount',name:'Mount Abbot',p1:'A hidden gem in the Kali Kumaon region.',p2:'Has worlds second-highest cricket pitch.',p3:'Breathtaking views of sunrises, sunsets',p4:' Charming colonial heritage.'},{id:2,image:"https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-07/5500603_18072520340067112871.jpg",title:"Bhowali ",info:" Neem Karori Baba ashram,'},{id:3,image:"https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-06/Bhimtal_Feature.jpg",title:"Bhimtal",info:"Island on the Lake",to:'/bhimtal',name:'Bhimtal',p1:' Surrounded by dense forests of oak, pine.',p2:'Has several historical sites.',p3:'large number of butterflies',p4:'Offers unparalleled adventure activities.'},{id:4,image:"https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-06/Ghangaria%20feature.jpg",title:"Ghangharia",info:"Base camp for trekkers",to:'/ghangharia',name:'Ghangharia',p1:'Popular base for trekkers.',p2:'Breathtaking landscape.',p3:'Last human settlement',p4:'Located in the Chamoli district.'},{id:5,image:"https://devilonwheels.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Darma_Valley_Dharma_Kumaon_Uttarakhand_trip_14.jpeg",title:"Darma Valley",info:"Trek the Himalayas",to:'/darma',name:'Darma Valley',p1:'Famous for the Darma Valley trek.',p2:'Attracts trekkers from across the world.',p3:'Enjoy local life in village home-stays',p4:'Offers stunning views of Panchachuli.'},{id:6,image:"https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-07/shutterstock_1251821659.jpg",title:"Munshiyari",info:"Milam and Johar",to:'/munshiyari',name:'Munshiyari',p1:'Pristine meadows and forests.',p2:'Offers stunning panoramic views.',p3:'Birthi Falls.',p4:' Snowbound for most of the year.'},{id:7,image:"https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-07/Bageshwar%20400x400.jpg",title:"Bageshwar",info:" Saryu and Gomti.",to:'/Bageshwar',name:'Bageshwar',p1:'An undiscovered temple town.',p2:'Exceptionally rich scenic delights .',p3:'Surrounded by lush grasslands',p4:' Several high-altitude treks start here'},{id:8,image:"https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2021-07/Feature.jpg",title:"Nanakmatta",info:"Celebrated Gurudwara ",to:'/Nanakmatta',name:'Nanakmatta',p1:'Famous for an eponymous Sikh shrine.',p2:'Home to Nanak Sagar dam on Saryu.',p3:'A haven for birdwatchers during winter.',p4:'A scenic picnic Dotted with fruit orchards and tea gardens.',p2:'Lush forests of deodar and rhododendron.',p3:'Elevation: 2,010 m',p4:'Askot Wildlife Sanctuary.'}];export default weekendapi;

sourcesContent:
const weekendapi = [
    {
      id: 1,
      image: "https://www.plushescapes.com/images/uploads/attachments/56594748173702583209455864742972365008756n.jpg",
      title: "Mount Abbot ",
      info: " Picturesque Hamlet",
      to: '/abbotmount',
      name: 'Mount Abbot',
      p1: 'A hidden gem in the Kali Kumaon region.',
      p2: 'Has worlds second-highest cricket pitch.',
      p3: 'Breathtaking views of sunrises, sunsets',
      p4:' Charming colonial heritage.'
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-07/5500603_18072520340067112871.jpg",
      title: "Bhowali ",
      info: " Neem Karori Baba Ashram",
      to: '/bhowali',
      name: 'Bhowali',
      p1: 'Heart of the states fruit basket.',
      p2: 'Gateway to Kumaon region.',
      p3: 'Pristine nature and scenic grandeur',
      p4:'Home to Neem Karoli Baba ashram,'
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-06/Bhimtal_Feature.jpg",
      title: "Bhimtal",
      info: "Island on the Lake",
      to: '/bhimtal',
      name: 'Bhimtal',
      p1: ' Surrounded by dense forests of oak, pine.',
      p2: 'Has several historical sites.',
      p3: 'large number of butterflies',
      p4: 'Offers unparalleled adventure activities.'
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-06/Ghangaria%20feature.jpg",
      title: "Ghangharia",
      info: "Base camp for trekkers",
      to: '/ghangharia',
      name: 'Ghangharia',
      p1: 'Popular base for trekkers.',
      p2: 'Breathtaking landscape.',
      p3: 'Last human settlement',
      p4:'Located in the Chamoli district.'
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      image: "https://devilonwheels.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Darma_Valley_Dharma_Kumaon_Uttarakhand_trip_14.jpeg",
      title: "Darma Valley",
      info: "Trek the Himalayas",
      to: '/darma',
      name: 'Darma Valley',
      p1: 'Famous for the Darma Valley trek.',
      p2: 'Attracts trekkers from across the world.',
      p3: 'Enjoy local life in village home-stays',
      p4:'Offers stunning views of Panchachuli.'
     
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-07/shutterstock_1251821659.jpg",
      title: "Munshiyari",
      info: "Milam and Johar",
      to: '/munshiyari',
      name: 'Munshiyari',
      p1: 'Pristine meadows and forests.',
      p2: 'Offers stunning panoramic views.',
      p3: 'Birthi Falls.',
      p4:' Snowbound for most of the year.'
    },
    {
      id: 7,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-07/Bageshwar%20400x400.jpg",
      title: "Bageshwar",
      info: " Saryu and Gomti.",
      to: '/Bageshwar',
      name: 'Bageshwar',
      p1: 'An undiscovered temple town.',
      p2: 'Exceptionally rich scenic delights .',
      p3: 'Surrounded by lush grasslands',
      p4:' Several high-altitude treks start here'
    },
    {
      id: 8,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2021-07/Feature.jpg",
      title: "Nanakmatta",
      info: "Celebrated Gurudwara ",
      to: '/Nanakmatta',
      name: 'Nanakmatta',
      p1: 'Famous for an eponymous Sikh shrine.',
      p2: 'Home to Nanak Sagar dam on Saryu.',
      p3: 'A haven for birdwatchers during winter.',
      p4:'A scenic picnic spot.'
    },
    {
      id: 9,
      image: "https://uttarakhandtourism.gov.in/sites/default/files/2020-06/Chaukori%20feature.jpg",
      title: "Chaukori",
      info: "Idyllic tourist destination",
      to: '/chaukori',
      name: 'Chaukori',
      p1: ' Dotted with fruit orchards and tea gardens.',
      p2: 'Lush forests of deodar and rhododendron.',
      p3: 'Elevation: 2,010 m',
      p4:'Askot Wildlife Sanctuary.'
    },
  ];
  
  export default weekendapi;
